WITHOUT A TRACE is a fast-paced procedural drama about the Missing Persons Squad 
of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. The sole responsibility of the special task force is 
to find missing persons by applying advanced psychological profiling techniques. 
The team reconstructs a "Day of Disappearance" timeline that details every minute of the 
24 hours prior to the disappearance, following one simple rule: learn who the victim is in 
order to learn where the victim is. Senior agent Jack Malone (Anthony LaPaglia) heads the 
dedicated team. His squad includes Samantha Spade (Poppy Montgomery), Vivian Johnson 
(Marianne Jean-Baptiste), Danny Taylor (Enrique Murciano), and Martin Fitzgerald (Eric Close).
